name: Pocket HalfPipe
description:
Tear it up and test your skills in this awesome arcade style skating game.

• Personalise your character!
• Unlock cool boards and moves!
• Achieve, achievements!
• Skate to playlists from your own library!
• GameCenter Enabled!
• Global Leaderboard!
• Retina Enabled!
• Fast App Switching Enabled!
• Works on iPad too!
• Create your own custom board designs!

• Secret stuff! (If you happen to be playing Pocket HalfPipe when the clock strikes Midnight, look out for a cool surprise!!)

• Reviews! Check out some of the great feedback Pocket HalfPipe has been getting!

Touch Arcade - "Players in our forums have been raving about Pocket HalfPipe, and whether you're into skateboarding or just naturally enjoyable gameplay it's definitely one you want to check out."

iTunes review - "Super mega ultra rad"

Dude, why are you even reading this? You're wasting precious Skate time!

Get on the HalfPipe now!!!
